Bebop

An attempt at a fast bebop style. Try it with a song like "Lemon Drop". Good tempos are 120 to 150 bpm.

  • Bebop
  • BebopPlus
  • BebopSus
  • BebopSusPlus
  • BebopIntro
  • BebopEnd

Bebop

A fast BeBop rhythm. (4)
